name: obstetric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also mainly US obstetrical, uk/ɒbˈstet.rɪk.əl/ us/ɑːbˈstet.rɪk.əl/) relating to the area of medicine that deals with pregnancy and the birth of babies: obstetric care/services an obstetric ultrasound There were obstetrical complications.
More examplesFewer examplesEven the most experienced midwives may not be able to deal with some obstetric complications.The hospital needs to be able to offer 24-hour obstetric services.I am so impressed by the expertise of the obstetric and gynaecological team here.This ward is for obstetric patients.In some countries there is still a lack of access to basic emergency obstetrical care.Complications of pregnancy such as preeclampsia or foetal distress require obstetrical intervention.
